intro: The v-breadcrumbs component is a navigational helper for pages. It can accept a Material Icons icon or text characters as a divider. An array of objects can be passed to the items property of the component. Additionally, slots exists for more control of the breadcrumbs, either utilizing v-breadcrumbs-item or other custom markup.

divider.heading: Divider
divider.intro: Breadcrumbs separator can be set using divider property.

iconDivider.heading: Icon Dividers
iconDivider.intro: For the icon variant, breadcrumbs can use any icon in Material Design Icons.

item.heading: Item
item.intro: You can use the item slot to customize each breadcrumb.
